project_descr: Build capacity within the government and and civil society institutions in Sint Maarten to create an enabling environment for rapid and sustainable recovery after a natural disaster.

outputs.output_descr: The aim of the project employ citizens of Sint Maarten in the repair of 500 households and 50 community infrastructures damaged after hurricane Irma.

document_name: Expression of Interest For Contractors to Supply Materials, Vehicles and Supervision of the Manpower for Clean-Up of Sites: Sint-Maarten Recovering Back Better (RBB)
REQUEST FOR QUOTATION (RFQ)- Promotional Goods Sint Maarten- SXM Suppliers
